title: More than 4 month trouble with support Google
content:
More than 4 months, 100 e-mails, 5 hours at phone, long discussions with your agents via irc... 
Since the begigning of a litigation with Google for a Pixel 3a that does not work, exchanged with another defective device, a deposit of â‚¬400 taken by mistake , a promised refund cancelled by one of your specialist ! A Google reply on Instagram 17 th feb, who said in 48 hours i'll be get an answer ... and still nothing after 5 days.

More infos about this crazy story :  https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/98512764?hl=fr

Thank you, Google, for your scam!
Thank you, Google, for disrespecting your customers.
Thank you, Google, for not keeping your commitments.
Thank you, Google, for wanting to deprive a user of his phone in times of COVID-19 or people need to be in contact with their loved ones.
Thanks you Google
